nodes.text: Nell Voorson was a Human female who was the wife of Johan Voorson, the mother of Shannon Voorson and the aunt of Deen Voorson during the time of the Galactic Civil War. In 3 ABY, she had been promoted to Senior Docking Officer for Kuat Freight Port. When her nephew Deen arrived home and asked her to allow him and the Rebel Alliance to steal a power generator, she refused. In her stead, Shannon put together the theft of the power generator and defected to the Rebel Alliance.
